name: Detective
description: Novels centered around detectives solving crimes, often featuring clever mysteries and deductive reasoning.

name: Robotics
description: Science fiction focusing on robots, artificial intelligence, and their interaction with humans and society.

name: Short Stories
description: Collections of brief, self-contained stories, often exploring imaginative concepts or focused themes.

name: Young Adult
description: Books targeting teenage readers, often featuring coming-of-age themes, fantasy, and adventure.

name: Epic Fantasy
description: Fantasy stories with expansive world-building, large casts, complex plots, and epic conflicts.

name: Adventure
description: Action-driven stories featuring exploration, quests, and exciting challenges in various settings.

name: Dystopian
description: Fiction set in oppressive, controlled, or post-apocalyptic societies exploring societal issues and human survival.

name: Alien Contact
description: Science fiction focusing on encounters with extraterrestrial life, first contact scenarios, and interstellar diplomacy.

name: Speculative Fiction
description: A broad category exploring 'what if' scenarios, often including science fiction, fantasy, and alternate histories.

name: Time Travel
description: Stories involving movement through time, exploring paradoxes, alternate histories, and the consequences of altering the past.

name: Social Commentary
description: Books that critique societal structures, politics, or culture, often through allegory or speculative settings.

name: Star Wars
description: Science fiction stories set in the Star Wars universe, featuring space opera adventures, iconic characters, and intergalactic conflicts.

name: Horror
description: Stories intended to frighten, unsettle, or disturb, often featuring supernatural elements or psychological terror.

name: Military
description: Fiction focusing on warfare, military strategy, and soldier experiences, often set in historical or speculative settings.

name: Biography
description: Non-fiction accounts of an individual's life, exploring personal achievements, challenges, and historical context.

name: Political History
description: Non-fiction works analyzing political events, governance, policies, and influential figures across history.

name: Law
description: Books exploring legal systems, judicial cases, or the history and philosophy of law.

name: Medieval History
description: Historical accounts and analyses focusing on the Middle Ages, including politics, culture, and society.

name: Classic
description: Timeless literature recognized for its artistic, cultural, or historical significance.

name: Nordic Noir
description: Crime fiction from Nordic countries characterized by dark themes, moral complexity, and bleak settings.

name: Contemporary
description: Fiction set in modern times, reflecting current society, culture, and everyday life.

name: Thriller
description: Fast-paced stories with tension, danger, and suspenseful plots, often overlapping with crime fiction.

name: Spy
description: Narratives centered around espionage, intelligence operations, and secret agents, often with international intrigue.

name: Mystery
description: Fiction centered around solving a puzzle, crime, or unexplained event, often emphasizing deduction and suspense.

name: Science Fiction
description: Speculative fiction exploring futuristic technology, scientific concepts, space travel, and societal impact of science.

name: Hard Sci-Fi
description: Science fiction with rigorous attention to scientific accuracy, technical detail, and plausibility in futuristic scenarios.

name: Space Opera
description: A subgenre of science fiction emphasizing epic interstellar adventures, space battles, and grand-scale civilizations.

name: Space Exploration
description: Stories focusing on humanity's exploration of space, including interplanetary travel, colonization, and scientific discovery.

name: Post-Apocalyptic
description: Fiction set after a societal collapse, exploring survival, dystopian worlds, and human resilience in harsh environments.

name: Fantasy
description: Stories set in imagined worlds, often featuring magic, mythical creatures, epic quests, and complex world-building.
